item.title: Engineering Planning Firm
item.description: While at AITEC, I consolidated my designing and technical drawing skills. Plan of wooden walls elevation realized with AutoCAD.

item.title: Engineering Without Borders
item.description: The collaboration with Ingenier√≠a sin Fronteras (Argentina) was developed on different field sites. Water storage project in Colonia Dora, Argentina.

item.title: Non-Fickian transport models for porous media flow.
item.description: My current PhD research focus is on non-Fickian transport models. The main goal is to formulate an upscaled version for the transport equation. Our main tools at MultiForM research group are open source and computationally efficent. OpenFOAM is the best example. This is an OpenFOAM simulation:
